attributes.action: Free Vote, End Political Union with the EU
attributes.additional_details: We the British People want an end to the Political Union with the EU, MPs if asked to vote on this should have a free vote, no whips, no bullying, no watering down our wishes, we want out of the political Union with the EU. You can have a Trade agreement without having to have the Political shackles of the EU, we want out of the EU, the Political Union.
